argument.name: options
argument.description: A JSON object specifying optional parameters. Available options include:

property.name: rows
property.description: The rows to submit. Can explicitly define as number or array of numbers to submit specific rows. Use the string 'current' to specify only the current row should be submitted. Use the string 'allRows' to submit all rows.

property.name: batchSize
property.description: Overrides the batch size property for the List control. Specifies the number of records to submit when data is synchronized using batches.

property.name: allChildRecords
property.description: Can be *[js:true]* or *[js:false]*. If true, child records will be submitted for a List control that has one or more child Lists.

property.name: allParentLists
property.description: Can be *[js:true]* or *[js:false]*. If true, parent records will be submitted for a List control that has a parent List.

property.name: resetMediaFileUploadErrors
property.description: Can be *[js:true]* or *[js:false]*. If true, file upload media errors will be reset. For PhoneGap applications with media files.

property.name: checkForMediaFiles
property.description: If true, new or updated media files will be synchronized. For PhoneGap applications with media files.

property.name: fixMediaFileReferences
property.description: Flag fix media file references. For PhoneGap applications with media files.

page.description: Synchronizes all Lists. This method calls the [{dialog.object}.saveListEdits()] method for each List in the component.
